people_also_ask.question: Who is the real god of war?
people_also_ask.heading: Ares
people_also_ask.heading2: Ares was the ancient Greek god of war or, more properly, the spirit of battle. He represented the distasteful aspects of brutal warfare and slaughter.
people_also_ask.title: Ares | God, Myths, Siblings, Family, & Facts | Britannica

people_also_ask.heading: Sony has announced an update to the PlayStation Store's game listing, and the company is giving the God of War HD Collection away for free. The game is. ... Sony had recently announced the March line-up of free games for PlayStation Plus subscribers.

people_also_ask.question: Will there be God of War 5?
people_also_ask.heading: God of War Ragnarök is an upcoming action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio and will be published by Sony Interactive Entertainment (SIE). It is scheduled to be released in 2022 for the PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5).
people_also_ask.title: God of War Ragnarök - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Is God of War 6 coming out?
people_also_ask.heading: God of War: Ragnarok is due to release in 2022 on PS5 and PS4, following a delay from its initial 2021 release window. There was already speculation that Ragnarok could be delayed, given that Sony hadn't mentioned the sequel in its plans for 2021 since the game's announcement.God of War: Ragnarok is due to release in 2022 on PS5 and PS4, following a delay from its initial 2021 release window. knowledge_panel.description: god of war is an action-adventure game franchise created by david jaffe at sony's santa monica studio. it began in 2005 on the playstation 2 video game console, and has become a flagship title for the playstation brand, consisting of eight games across multiple platforms with a ninth currently in development. wikipedia
